title: Taito TypeX2 Multi [RC2] with 23 Games!
description:
The Latest (RC2) Freeware Taito TypeX2 Multigame with 23 Games included!

How to Use:

0.) If your coming from RC1, you will need to reimage the drive. Update packages wont be available until the first official release.
1.) Download the Torrent
2.) Unrar the disk image and write it to your HDD/SDD using something capable of handeling raw disk images. Such as "dd" that you find in Linux.


If you wish to add other/different games.

1.) Place all your games into seperate folders on third partition ( labeled "TTXMulti[Games]" ). For example lets say you wanted to put King of Fighters XIII on the multi. You would create a folder named "King of Fighters XIII" on the third partition ( labeled "TTXMulti[Games]" ) then place all the game files into your newly created "King of Fighters XIII" folder.
2.) Once you have your games added to the multi, unmount the drive, connect it to your TypeX2 and enjoy :).


Screenshot: 
http://i.imgur.com/h01BGyi.jpg

Games Included:

BattleFantasia
BlazBlue CalamityTrigger
BlazBlue ContinuumShift
Chaos Breaker
GigaWing Generations

King of Fighters 98 Ultimate Match

King of Fighters SkyStage
King of Fighters XII
King of Fighters XIII
PowerInstinct 5
Raiden 3
Raiden 4
